newsitem.title: UK: UK Treasury sees rising activity, lack of pressure.
newsitem.headline: UK Treasury sees rising activity, lack of pressure.

text.p: British economic data showing a fall in unemployment and steady average earnings growth reflect a strengthening economy and a lack of inflationary pressures, the British Treasury said on Wednesday.
"Today's employment figures, combined with stable earnings, underline a picture of strengthening economic activity with a general lack of inflationary pressures," a Treasury official said.
Unemployment fell 15,600 in August, with the unemployment rate falling to 7.5 percent from 7.6 percent. Average earnings in July showed annual growth of 3.75 percent, unchanged from the rate in June.
